name: Monster Wars
summary:
The follow-up to Legendary Wars unleashed! There are two sides to every story. This is the legend of the Monster Wars... 
 
They've been hunted for gold and experience for years, and now its time for revenge! Take command of over 50 Monsters, in a perfect blend of Castle Defense, Hack and Slash action and RPG. Build-up a powerful Monster Army and conquer the land of Legendaria! It's time for the Monsters to have their revenge.
